001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.DecimalItemImpl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
014
015import java.math.BigDecimal;
016import java.math.RoundingMode;
017
018import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
019
020/**
021 * An atomic Metapath item containing a decimal data value.
022 */
023public interface IDecimalItem extends INumericItem {
024  /**
025   * The decimal item with the value "0".
026   */
027  @NonNull
028  IDecimalItem ZERO = valueOf(ObjectUtils.notNull(BigDecimal.ZERO));
029
030  /**
031   * Get the type information for this item.
032   *
033   * @return the type information
034   */
035  @NonNull
036  static IAtomicOrUnionType<IDecimalItem> type() {
037    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DECIMAL.getItemType();
038  }
039
040  @Override
041  default IAtomicOrUnionType<? extends IDecimalItem> getType() {
042    return type();
043  }
044
045  /**
046   * Construct a new decimal item using the provided string {@code value}.
047   *
048   * @param value
049   *          a string representing a decimal value
050   * @return the new item
051   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
052   *           if the given string is not a decimal value
053   */
054  @NonNull
055  static IDecimalItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
056    try {
057      return valueOf(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DECIMAL.parse(value));
058    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
059      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
060          null,
061          String.format("Invalid decimal value '%s'. %s",
062              value,
063              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
064          ex);
065    }
066  }
067
068  /**
069   * Construct a new decimal item using the provided {@code value}.
070   *
071   * @param value
072   *          a long value
073   * @return the new item
074   */
075  @NonNull
076  static IDecimalItem valueOf(long value) {
077    return valueOf(ObjectUtils.notNull(BigDecimal.valueOf(value)));
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Construct a new decimal item using the provided {@code value}.
082   *
083   * @param value
084   *          a double value
085   * @return the new item
086   */
087  @NonNull
088  static IDecimalItem valueOf(double value) {
089    return valueOf(ObjectUtils.notNull(Double.toString(value)));
090  }
091
092  /**
093   * Construct a new decimal item using the provided {@code value}.
094   *
095   * @param value
096   *          a double value
097   * @return the new item
098   */
099  @NonNull
100  static IDecimalItem valueOf(boolean value) {
101    return valueOf(DecimalItemImpl.toBigDecimal(value));
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * Construct a new decimal item using the provided {@code value}.
106   *
107   * @param value
108   *          a decimal value
109   * @return the new item
110   */
111  @NonNull
112  static IDecimalItem valueOf(@NonNull BigDecimal value) {
113    return new DecimalItemImpl(value);
114  }
115
116  /**
117   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
118   *
119   * @param item
120   *          the item to cast
121   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
122   *         cast to this type
123   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
124   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
125   */
126  @NonNull
127  static IDecimalItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
128    IDecimalItem retval;
129    if (item instanceof IDecimalItem) {
130      retval = (IDecimalItem) item;
131    } else if (item instanceof INumericItem) {
132      retval = valueOf(((INumericItem) item).asDecimal());
133    } else if (item instanceof IBooleanItem) {
134      retval = valueOf(((IBooleanItem) item).toBoolean());
135    } else {
136      try {
137        retval = valueOf(item.asString());
138      } catch (IllegalStateException | InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
139        // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
140        throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
141      }
142    }
143    return retval;
144  }
145
146  @Override
147  default IDecimalItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
148    return cast(item);
149  }
150
151  @Override
152  default boolean toEffectiveBoolean() {
153    return !BigDecimal.ZERO.equals(asDecimal());
154  }
155
156  @SuppressWarnings("null")
157  @Override
158  default INumericItem abs() {
159    return new DecimalItemImpl(asDecimal().abs());
160  }
161
162  @SuppressWarnings("null")
163  @Override
164  default IIntegerItem ceiling() {
165    return IIntegerItem.valueOf(asDecimal().setScale(0, RoundingMode.CEILING).toBigIntegerExact());
166  }
167
168  @SuppressWarnings("null")
169  @Override
170  default IIntegerItem floor() {
171    return IIntegerItem.valueOf(asDecimal().setScale(0, RoundingMode.FLOOR).toBigIntegerExact());
172  }
173
174  /**
175   * Compares this value with the argument.
176   *
177   * @param item
178   *          the item to compare with this value
179   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
180   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
181   */
182  default int compareTo(@NonNull IDecimalItem item) {
183    return asDecimal().compareTo(item.asDecimal());
184  }
185
186  @Override
187  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
188    return compareTo(cast(item));
189  }
190}
